name: Rainy Run
description: You're walking home on a dark, rainy night when suddenly a wolf comes out of the forest to eat you! It's time to run, but the path is full of broken trees! Click to jump over the fallen trees and hold to jump for longer. If you fall, the wolf will come closer to you until you can get away. If you can get away, you have a chance to recover. If you fall while the wolf is close to you, the wolf will catch you!
